column3: Jurgen Schmidhuber Director of Swiss AI lab IDSIA for 25 years * Marcus Hutter invented AIXI at IDSIA. Became senior researcher at DeepMind * Shane Legg completed PhD thesis under Marcus Hutter at IDSIA. Shane Legg became co-founder of DeepMind * Schmidhuber and Sepp Hochreiter invented LSTM. Hochreiter became DeepMind 1st employee
AI goals are not human goals
